TopicTitle: Odd behaviour of parts that broke off

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win10 | CPU: i7-10700K | GPU: RTX2060 | RAM: 32GB

 

During my little excursion, a terrain bug (reported) caused my craft to flip (again), crash, and some parts broke off. Despite not moving much, the distance on their marker started increasing rapidly. Then they started shaking, moving about, one piece, while still violently shaking started to float. One part disappeared as soon as it hit the distance of 50km (which, in reality, was still few meters away). As in video.
